plot outline: Frustrated and annoyed with the pointlessness and insensitivity that comes with casteism, Ramji, an old Dalit man, decides to give up his religion. However, his ever-pious wife is against it and prohibits from doing so. Nonetheless, Ramji goes ahead with his plan of fighting casteism, bringing out the truth of modern casteism in a comical yet emotional manner.
title: Tame keva?
plot: Frustrated and annoyed with the pointlessness and insensitivity that comes with casteism, Ramji, an old Dalit man, decides to give up his religion.
